TopicTitle: Gilly: The place of no Gravity.

Articles.Content:
This thread is for all the things you can do at Gilly. Let's begin!

Gilly: The place where you can land your 200 ton mothership with RCS.

Gilly: The place where you can land on Eve if you jump.

Gilly: The place where telekinesis really DOES work.

Gilly: The place with less gravity than gravity hacked Kerbin

Gilly: The place where you can headbutt your rocket off the ground.

He tripped and fell, then banged his head on the ship when standing up.
Gilly; the only place where the LM may be replaced by a jetpack
Gilly - The WORST place for a Space Elevator
Gilly, The best place for Mass relays.
Gilly: Manufacturing the galaxy's best dilithium crystals since 2314!

Nice, but in theory isn't there no place in the universe where there is zero gravity? Doesn't the force of gravity extend forever?

If that's true, it's another reason for people to stops saying "zero gravity."

Gilly, the place where pointing prograde while landing is a good idea. (to save time)
Gilly: where the force of gravity is less than hacked gravity on Kerbin's surface.
Gilly: Where you can pretend to be Superman!
Gilly: The land where trampolines are not needed.
Gilly: where the gravity is so low and the terrain so lumpy that the map screen can't tell where the ground really is.

Gilly: Where you get an apoasis with every step you take

Gilly: Where when using an EVA pack, you need to make sure not to accidently get into orbit

Gilly: where my thoughts escaping!

Gilly: where the music's playing!

Gilly: where my love was waiting! (Silently for me...)

...Oh come on, someone had to do it!

Gilly: where you often find yourself burning straight down to land faster.

Gilly: where orbiting into a mountain is landing

Gilly: where ion engines are useful

Gilly: where you can move your ship by transferring fuel

Gilly: The place of Invasions.

In Gillviet Krussia, Rover backflips over YOU!
Huh, I should really go to Gilly.
Gilly: where your ship is larger than your orbit's apoapsis.
Gilly: Lonely Space Trampoline
Gilly: The place where you can use the power of beans to play Quidditch.

Take me down to the surface of Gilly,

Where the gravitys low and the dirt is gritty,

Oh won't you please take me home!!!

etc. etc.
Gilly, where you can trip and fall forward and still somehow land exactly where you tripped.
Gilly, the Place, where you really shouldn't do Push Ups!

Nice, but in theory isn't there no place in the universe where there is zero gravity? Doesn't the force of gravity extend forever?

If that's true, it's another reason for people to stops saying "zero gravity."

How about zero relative gravity?
Didn't Scott Manley once show that you could actually return to Kerbin on RCS if you jump from Gilly at just the right time?
